Header.skillsTitle: Tech stack I use every day
Header.skillsDescription: Combining frontend, backend, mobile, and design tools to build complete products from idea to deployment.

Info.name: Khanh Linh
Info.bio: I'm a Junior Developer who loves combining system thinking with a strong focus on user experience to build modern digital products. In this portfolio, you'll find web and app projects that I've crafted end-to-end, from architecture and code to real-world usability. My goal is to ship reliable, intuitive products where every line of code and every UI detail adds meaningful value to the user.

Projects.searchPlaceholder: Search projects by title or filter by category

Contact.title: Let's Connect
Contact.message: I'm always interested in hearing about new projects and opportunities. Feel free to reach out through any of the channels below.
Contact.sub_message: Whether you have a project in mind, want to collaborate, or just want to say hello, you can contact me easily via email, phone, or social media.
Contact.cta_message: Don't hesitate to get in touch. I'm always open to discussing web development, creative projects, or opportunities to be part of your vision.
Contact.name: Vo Khanh Linh
